DOC.brief_summary: A cohort 3000 adult follow evaluate effectiveness monovalent 2009 H1N1 vaccine use 2009-2010 seasonal influenza vaccine use 2010-2011 prevent first laboratory-confirmed 2009 H1N1 influenza influenza season 2010-11 .
DOC.brief_title: Evaluation Effectiveness Vaccination With 2009 H1N1 Vaccines During Influenza Season 2010-11
DOC.detailed_description: In begin study , change background information collect original study ( conduct 2009-2010 ) ask questionnaire . Information influenza vaccination collect vaccination card monthly short message service ( SMS ) , verified register , need . If epidemic cause 2009 H1N1 virus start Finland , participant ask actively report symptom influenza like illness ( ILI ) . The symptom also monitor weekly SMS . In case ILI , nasal oral swab collect verify 2009 H1N1 influenza case . Paired serum sample collect acute convalescence phase disease . The occurrence laboratory-confirmed 2009 H1N1 influenza case compare vaccinated ( yet ) vaccinate person .
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion interview followup : Participating study `` Evaluation vaccination campaign A ( H1N1 ) v pandemic vaccine : prospective cohort study '' ( AH1N148309THL ) Assigned use service Tampere health care centre ; Written consent interview followup phase obtain mail ; Able adhere protocolrequired study procedure without special burden risk , judge participant himself/herself Inclusion criterion confirmation 2009 H1N1 influenza case : Participating study interview followup current study 'Evaluation effectiveness vaccination 2009 H1N1 vaccine influenza season 201011 ( H1N149510THL ) Assigned use service Tampere health care centre Written inform consent confirmation phase obtain first study visit Able adhere protocol require study procedure without special burden risk , judge investigator designate Exclusion criterion : No specific exclusion criterion apply
